    • Constructor Detail

      • DataOneMapper

        public DataOneMapper()
        This method is the constructore which creates 2 DataOneXMLParser objects. One is for the configFiles.xml and the other for the input file.

    • Method Detail

      • getXpath

        public java.lang.String getXpath​(java.lang.String fileType)
                          throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        getXpath method detects the file takes the fileType as input, which is return value of the Tika Detector.detect method object. It uses the string and evaluates about the fileType and then returns the Xpath values for the given input file for gettting hte metadata fields.
        Parameters:
        fileType - The filetype detected using the tika detector.detect method.
        Returns:
        xPath A string for the xPath values for extracting metadata fields from configFiles.xml
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException

      • getMetadataList

        public java.lang.Object[] getMetadataList​(java.lang.String xPath)
                                   throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                          java.io.IOException,
                                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                          javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        getMetadataList method detects the xPath as input, and uses the configParser object for getting the metadata fields.
        Parameters:
        xPath - The filetype detected using the tika detector.detect method.
        Returns:
        Object[] An array of object containing the metadata fields and its vaules.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • getMetaDataVal

        public java.lang.Object[] getMetaDataVal​(java.io.File file,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> metaDataFields)
                                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                         javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        getMetaDataVal method takes the input file and the Metadata fields as input, for extracting different fields. The metadatafields is metadataValues, which is return object of getMetaDataList method.
        Parameters:
        file - The input file for extracting the contents.
        metaDataFields - list of the metadata fields that needs to extracted from the input file.
        Returns:
        Object[] An array of object containing the metadata fields and its vaules.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • getNamespace

        public void getNamespace​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namespace,

      • getTikaParser

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTikaParser​(java.io.File file)
                                               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                      org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
        getTikaParser method takes the input file as input parameter, It uses the AutoDetectParser class of Tika application, for detecting the file type and parser accordingly. Once it has detected the parser, then it create a list of the metadata fields and contents.
        Parameters:
        file - The input file for extracting the contents.
        Returns:
        metaData a List containing the metadata content and its values.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
